description:
We're seeking a mid-level or Web Developer. You’ll start by tackling bug fixes and maintaining our existing system and gradually transition into developing new features, integrations, and updates.
What You’ll Do:
• Start with bug fixes and system maintenance to get familiar with our platform.
• Transition into feature development, integrations, and system updates.
• Collaborate on modernizing our applications, utilizing Microsoft Azure services.
• Participate in independent and collaborative tasks, with Zoom meetings as needed.
Must-Have Skills:
• Asp.net, Razor and TypeScript expertise.
• Experience with Angular 2+ (Familiarity with AngularJS helpful).
• Familiarity with Git for version control and Azure DevOps for CI/CD.
• Strong verbal and written communication skills.
Nice-to-Have Skills:
• Experience with MongoDB, DevOps practices, and Microsoft Azure services.
• Knowledge of SQL and experience working with relational databases.
• Full-stack development experience.
• Familiarity with distributed systems and microservices.
• Remote work experience.
